title: Tribal Nami
body:
http://img13.deviantart.net/3f5e/i/2016/048/c/4/river_spirit_nami_chroma__tribal_by_apcarrykitty-d9s6dho.png

Can't wait for chromas to come back and be nicer.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JqyfMwI46oo

replies.body:
Oooh, this is cool idea! 

I agree with AvantelWings - this could be so much more than a chroma! The color scheme is awesome and something that is pretty different from what she's got already. 

Man, there have been too many cool Nami skins on the boards lately.

Thanks! I was very pleased with how this came out. The warm colors give her more of a "native" sort of feel. I wonder what sort of new skin it could spawn. I loved the way the dark hair and brown skin came out.
I agree! My mind instantly went to Sun Goddess Karma. ^-^
That would be a good theme to add a few champs to! A tribal, mayan inspired set of skins
I approve, looks like a cool idea for a new type of skin though, not just a chroma (DTN, thoughts?)
Maybe some sort of Nile Nami skin. A more African waters sort of feel.
